thread.title: The iPhone 6s Plus Costs $236 to Build, Comes with a $749 Price Tag
thread.title_full: The iPhone 6s Plus Costs $236 to Build, Comes with a $749 Price Tag - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: The iPhone 6s Plus Costs $236 to Build, Comes with a $749 Price Tag
text: According to an analysis by IHS Technology, Apple pays a total of $236 for the assembly process and the components included in their flagship iPhone 6s Plus smartphone with 16 GB of storage. This cost is broken down in $231.5 for the actual components used to build the iPhone 6s Plus and $4.5 for the test and manufacturing costs which, together, set Apple's total cost of building a new 16 GB iPhone 6s Plus to $236.
